item.title: Mushoku Tensei: Jobless Reincarnation – Chronicle of Echoes announced for iOS, Android
item.content:encoded:
• Smartphone

Due out in 2026 in Japan.

Publisher GREE and developer ASOBIMO have announced Mushoku Tensei: Jobless Reincarnation – Chronicle of Echoes, a 3D battle RPG based on the TV anime Mushoku Tensei: Jobless Reincarnation for iOS and Android. It will launch as a free download with in-app purchases in 2026 in Japan.

Watch the announcement teaser trailer below. Visit the official website here. Follow the game on Twitter here.

Announce Teaser Trailer



https://www.gematsu.com/2026/01/mushoku-tensei-jobless-reincarnation-chronicle-of-echoes-announced-for-ios-android

item.title: Uta no Prince-sama: Shining Live for Nintendo Switch launches in 2026 in Japan
item.content:encoded:
• Switch

First teaser trailer released.

The October 2023-announced Uta no Prince-sama: Shining Live for Nintendo Switch will launch in 2026 in Japan, Broccoli announced.

The Switch title adapts the mobile game Uta no Prince-sama: Shining Live, which ended service on December 26, 2022. It will feature various stories with voice acting, touch controls, controller support during concerts, and tons of artwork.

Watch a teaser trailer below.

Teaser Trailer
